title: Between Cases
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition of ASIN B07GX542QZHe was the plot twist she hadn't planned for...Workaholic? Check.Poor choice in men? Check.Debatably losing the plot? Check.Payton Callaghan has had enough. She needs time away from her stressful job, time away from her disaster of a love life and what she really doesn’t need is a hot bookshop owner trying to verbally outwit her in the middle of his store.Owen Anders believes in creating his own plot. Successful businessman, talented musician and book nerd, he hadn’t accounted for Payton and her wrath at the exact moment his well-constructed world was hitting an unplanned crisis. However, he needs a lawyer and he thinks she needs him.With Payton insistent that a relationship is not in an upcoming chapter, can Owen persuade her to change her plot and ensure her happily ever after stars him?
author: Annie Dyer
